courses.title: Communication
courses.prerequisite: For all 010 courses: Satisfactory scores on English portion of ACT test and TSI examination or ENGL 0301. For ENGL 1302, a grade of 'C' or better in ENGL 1301.
courses.notes: See General Education Core for more details. Options: ENGL 1301

courses.title: American History
courses.notes: See General Education Core for more details. Options: HIST 1301 or HIST 2327

courses.title: Social and Behavioral Sciences
courses.notes: See General Education Core for course options.

courses.title: Introduction to Dance
courses.notes: Required course for Dance majors. Not required for Dance minors. Only offered Fall.

courses.title: Dance Technique #1 Foundations in Contemporary Dance
courses.notes: See degree plan and consult with faculty advisor.

courses.title: Dance Technique #2 Foundations level of Ballet, Mexican Folklorico Dance, or Spanish Dance
courses.notes: See degree plan and consult with faculty advisor. Recommended: DANC 2341, 2349, or 2254. Must complete at least 2 hours in each technique area: Ballet, Folklorico, Flamenco. Choose one.

courses.title: Learning Framework
courses.notes: As required, based on credit hours earned, TSI status, High school rank, major declaration.

courses.title: Communication
courses.prerequisite: For all 010 courses: Satisfactory scores on English portion of ACT test and TSI examination or ENGL 0301. For ENGL 1302, a grade of 'C' or better in ENGL 1301.
courses.notes: See General Education Core for more details. Options: ENGL 1302 or ENGL 1305

courses.title: Mathematics
courses.prerequisite: College Ready TSI status in Mathematics or MATH 0314/0332/0342.
courses.notes: See General Education Core for course options. MATH 1314 or higher recommended.

courses.title: Integrative/Experimental Learning Option
courses.notes: See General Education Core for course options.

courses.title: Dance Improvisation
courses.prerequisite: Credit or registration in DANC 2246, DANC 2345, DANC 3246, DANC 3345, DANC 4246, or DANC 4345.
courses.notes: Satisfies Major-Specific Requirement. Please note students must meet a prerequisite or co-requisite of a Contemporary Dance technique course. Only offered Spring.

courses.title: Dance Technique #1 Foundations in Contemporary Dance
courses.notes: Students must complete a Contemporary Dance technique course to satisfy either a prerequisite or co-requisite requirement. Recommended: DANC 2345. See degree plan and consult with faculty advisor.

courses.title: Dance Technique #2 Foundations level in previously chosen technique
courses.notes: See degree plan and consult with faculty advisor. Recommended: DANC 2341, 2349, or 2254. Must complete at least 2 hours in each technique area: Ballet, Folklorico, Flamenco. Choose technique not yet taken.

courses.title: Anatomy and Physiology I
courses.notes: 1 hour of lab for Core 090.

courses.title: Integrative/Experimental Learning Option
courses.notes: See General Education Core for course options.

courses.courseNumber: Choose from Intermediate Contemporary Dance or Ballet
courses.title: Intermediate Contemporary Dance or Intermediate Ballet
courses.prerequisite: Students must complete a total of 5 hours (both the 3sch + 2sch technique courses) of each technique level before progressing to the next level (2000 to 3000/3000 to 4000), or permission of faculty.
courses.notes: See degree plan for course options and consult with faculty advisor.

courses.title: Additional DANC Technique Electives
courses.notes: Complete 12 advanced hours with 5 hours minimum from two of the four dance technique areas: modern, ballet, folklorico, flamenco. Consult with faculty advisor.

courses.title: Music for Dancers
courses.notes: Satisfies Major-Specific Requirement. Only offered Fall.

courses.title: Dance Performance: Beginning/Intermediate or Intermediate/Advanced
courses.notes: Must be registered concurrently in any dance technique course. Consult with faculty advisor.

courses.title: Language, Philosophy & Culture

courses.title: Creative Arts
courses.notes: Must not be DANC 2323 Dance Appreciation. See General Education Core for course options.

courses.notes: Complete 12 advanced hours with 5 hours minimum from two of the four dance technique areas: modern, ballet, folklorico, flamenco. Consult with faculty advisor.

courses.notes: Must be registered concurrently in any dance technique course. Consult with faculty advisor.

courses.notes: Satisfies Major-Specific Requirement. Offered Spring (ODD years) or Summer.
